data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Rif Dimashq, Syria.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Rif Dimashq, Syria

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 5,404 believers in Rif Dimashq to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 2,836,000 people living in the state of Rif Dimashq.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Rif Dimashq
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Arab, Palestinian people. 0.5% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Rif Dimashq, Syria so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 5,404 believers in Rif Dimashq against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.section_summary:
the state of Rif Dimashq, Syria has a population of 2,836,000.

We estimate Rif Dimashq has 5,404 people who might know Jesus, 156,829 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,673,767 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 524 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 5,404 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.
